net.proteusframework.core.notification

Interface Notifiable<S>

  • Type Parameters:
    S - the source type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ForwardingNotifiable, InternationalizedException, ListNotifiable, ValidationException

    public interface Notifiable<S>
    Interface for objects that receive messages.
    Author:
    Ben Barber (bbarber@i2rd.com)
